text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * The name of Versailles, then a small village, appears for the first time in a Medieval charter. * In the Muslim kingdom of Zaragoza, the ruling Banu Tujibi family is removed by Suleiman Al-Mustain I ibn Hud who starts the Huddid dynasty which rules over the region for a century (possibly 1039). ==== Asia ==== * The Western Xia declare their independence from Liao China. == Deaths == * August 15 - Saint Stephen I, first king of Hungary * October 29 - Aethelnoth, Archbishop of Canterbury * Alhazen, Persian mathematician * William VI of Aquitaine == References ==
